thread.title: Omnitracs Launches Strategic Partnership Initiative with Mack Trucks
thread.title_full: Omnitracs Launches Strategic Partnership Initiative with Mack Trucks - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Omnitracs Launches Strategic Partnership Initiative with Mack Trucks
text:
Omnitracs, LLC
Telematics Leader to Expand Mack Trucks' Fleet Management Service Options
DALLAS , Aug. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Omnitracs, LLC , a leading provider of fleet management solutions to transportation and logistics companies, today announced it has entered into a formal memorandum of understanding with Mack Trucks, Inc ., to provide its telematics software to enhance future offerings of MackÂ® Fleet Management Services. The announcement reinforces Omnitracs' ongoing commitment to partner with OEMs to deliver solutions that allow fleets to take their operations to the next level-better controlling costs, safety, vehicle maintenance and diagnostics, driver workflow and compliance.
"Mack, with its rich heritage and outstanding reputation, is perfectly aligned with Omnitracs and its focus on bringing to market quality, innovative solutions to help customers streamline operations," said Rich Glasmann , vice president of OEM strategy, sales and marketing for Omnitracs. "This partnership is a testament to how Omnitracs has evolved to meet the needs of OEMs, providing a cloud-based offering that will supply meaningful insights for customers looking to solve their critical business problems."
Both Mack and Omnitracs share a common focus on durability, reliability and total customer satisfaction, and are both united by a vested interest in utilizing technology to improve operational efficiency and vehicle performance. Upon implementation, this strategic partnership will provide a platform for each business to play to its core strengths, resulting in faster uptime and enhanced service for customers.
"Over the years, Mack has brought to market unparalleled vehicle-centric solutions," said David Pardue , Mack vice president of aftermarket business development. "Couple that with Omnitracs' dedication to pioneering technology that improves fleet management, and you're left with an unbeatable combination; an alliance that will ultimately allow mutual customers to better operate in a complex business landscape."
To learn more about Omnitracs and its full suite of mobile business intelligence for the transportation and logistics industry, please visit: www.omnitracs.com .
About Omnitracs, LLC
Omnitracs, LLC is a global pioneer of fleet management, routing and predictive analytics solutions for private and for-hire fleets. Omnitracs' nearly 1,000 employees deliver software-as-a-service-based solutions to help more than 40,000 private and for-hire fleet customers manage nearly 1,500,000 mobile assets in more than 70 countries. The company pioneered the use of commercial vehicle telematics over 25 years ago and today its intuitive technologies, including solutions for safety and compliance, fuel efficiency, driver retention, fleet productivity, GPS fleet tracking, route planning, scheduling, and fleet maintenance, enable customers to solve common fleet problems and achieve their business objectives. Omnitracs, LLC includes Roadnet Technologies, XRS, Sylectus, Omnitracs Analytics, and Omnitracs Mexico. Omnitracs is part of the Vista Equity Partners portfolio of companies.
